Male01_Hat_spelunker_24_description
A sturdy green helmet designed to protect the heads of spelunkers. However, it does not come with a lamp for shedding light on the darker areas of a cave.[#Legal]
Un solide casque vert conçu pour protéger la tête des spéléologues. Il est toutefois dénué de lampe pouvant éclairer les zones les plus sombres des cavernes.[#Legal]
Ein stabiler, grüner Helm, der den Kopf des Spelunkers schützt. Er hat jedoch keine Lampe zum Ausleuchten dunklerer Bereiche einer Höhle.[#Legal]
Un casco verde da speleologo. Robusto e affidabile, è tuttavia sprovvisto di lampada e non consente di illuminare gli angoli più bui di una grotta.[#Legal]
Robusto casco verde destinado a proteger el cráneo de los espeleólogos. No tiene lámpara para iluminar las zonas oscuras de las cuevas.[#Legal]
洞窟探険家の頭を守ってくれる、頑丈な緑のヘルメット。ただし、暗い場所を照らすためのライトは付いていない。[#Legal]
동굴 탐험가의 머리를 지켜 주는 튼튼한 그린 헬멧. 그러나 어두운 장소를 비추기 위한 라이트는 달려있지 않다.[#Legal]
A sturdy green helmet designed to protect the heads of spelunkers. However, it does not come with a lamp for shedding light on the darker areas of a cave.[#Legal]
堅固的綠色安全帽，能夠保護洞窟探險家的頭部。不過，並沒有附帶用來照明的頭燈。[#Legal]
堅固的綠色安全帽，能夠保護洞窟探險家的頭部。不過，並沒有附帶用來照明的頭燈。[#Legal]
A sturdy green helmet designed to protect the heads of spelunkers. However, it does not come with a lamp for shedding light on the darker areas of a cave.[#Legal]
